actions.text: Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution returning to the Senate the bill S. 1712.

summary.text: Expresses the opinion of the House of Representatives that a certain Senate bill (S. 1712) which provides for an extension of certain excise tax rates contravenes the U.S. Constitution and is an infringement of the privileges of the House. Returns such bill to the Senate.

titles.title: A resolution returning to the Senate the bill S. 1712.
